name: angular-code-quote
description: Angular module to use the [Code-Quote](http://codequote.azurewebsites.net/) service. Download the source code in the _src_ folder, or use the [RawGit](https://rawgit.com) url **https://cdn.rawgit.com/GoodSoil/Angular-Code-Quote/master/src/angular-code-quote.js** as your cdn (content delivery network).
